title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 658.7 - Adjournments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 658.7 - Adjournments

State Regulations
(a) An application
for adjournment shall not be granted except for good cause and unless written
request is presented therefor to the hearing officer in advance of the
hearing. (b) In the event a request
for an adjournment is made for the first time at the hearing, the hearing shall
not be deemed to have been adjourned unless the request is granted by the
hearing officer and is duly noted on the record. (c) Adjournments when granted shall be to a
time, day and place certain. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
658.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
